column1: I have decided to stop eating flesh. I decided over 6 weeks ago and until now I haven't taken any beef, chicken or fish. I've been eating cabbage only but I want to eat proper vegan meals. Please help me with recipes for vegan meals. Thank you. Maxwell
I looked through yesterday and found poached eggs with smoked salmon, now can't find it - M&S I think
Why do you keep removing recipes?
